body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.3 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for graphics bounds tracking.
A number of fixes to the builtin Internet Explorer.
Support for displaying ARM code in the Wine debugger.
Various DirectMusic improvements.
Better namespace support in MSXML.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
